articles.title: About this site
articles.description: The personal website of Duncan Garmonsway.
articles.contents:
I am a data scientist in the UK Government Digital Service and have
previously worked for Scottish Power and various New Zealand ministries. I studied English
Literature at University College
London and Applied Statistics at Victoria University of
Wellington.
I wrote Spreadsheet
Munging Strategies, a guide to getting data out of complex
spreadsheets using my R packages tidyxl and unpivotr. I am an ROpenSci reviewer. Find more of
my work on CRAN
and GitHub.
I am a Christian
and have been a member of the choirs of Wellington Cathedral of
Saint Paul, St Maryâ€™s
Cathedral, Glasgow, and Pinner Parish Church.
I play the violin, badminton,
and go cycle touring.
Read https://rweekly.org/ for more R blogs.

articles.title: Duncan Garmonsway
articles.description:
The personal website of Duncan Garmonsway, data scientist and UK civil
servant.
